description.@en: The Crouching One makes specific demands from His priesthood. His Bloodmongers must spill the blood of animals in contrition and bleed themselves of foul humours often. Sometimes, they must carry out dangerous, ritualistic missions to assassinate specific people who displease the god. Rarer still they must indoctrinate their victim’s children into their sacred order, turning them into hired killers or worse.

effect.@en: When you would normally invoke a Chaos Manifestation, you instead provoke Punishments of the Crouching One. In addition, you are bound by the commandments of your god, as outlined in Chapter 10: Grimoire. You must seek atonement if you violate these commandments.
